name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_244Am
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Am" means the element "americium" and "244Am" is the isotope "americium-244" with a half-life of 4.20e-01 days.
